newsitem.title: USA: Rational files to offer 5.1 mln shares.
newsitem.headline: Rational files to offer 5.1 mln shares.

text.p: Rational Software Corp said Thursday it had filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission for a public offering of 5,106,718 shares.
The company said 4,150,000 shares will be offered by the company and 956,718 will be offered by stockholders.
The size of the offering reflects a two-for-one stock split, the filing said. After the offering, there will be 38.6 million outstanding common shares.
The offering will be made through Hambrecht & Quist, Goldman Sachs & Co, and Wessels, Arnold & Henderson. The company granted the underwriters an over-allotment option on up to 766,007 shares.
The company will use its proceeds for working capital, general corporate purposes and possible acquisitions, the filing said.
